text: Taking us through a typical day, from thearousalarisingrisingarousedarousalof the senses in the morning to the reverie of sleep and dreams, Ackerman releasesrevealingrevisesrevealsrevealsthe human form as we’ve never seen it: busy, cunning, andmiraclemaliciousmiraculousmiragemiraculous. Advances in genetics and medical imaging haveallowedallowingpermittedpermittingallowedus to peer more deeply inside ourselves than ever before, and one of the most amazing recent discoveries is that we are intensely rhythmic creatures. The human body is like a clock – actually an entire shop of clocks —majoringmeasuredmimickingmeasuringmeasuringout the seconds, minutes, days, and seasons of life.
